name: ALILO on a busy planet
description:
Hi! My name is Alilo and I have a mission. I am here to scout this planet and collect intel for our next invasion, don't take it too personal. At first, I'll need to gather some crates after a rough landing... surprisingly crates heal my wounds and provide me with weapons!

Take care! I hope nothing gets out of control. How long can you survive? Please, let my comander know! Post a comment with your high score.

CONTROLS:

The game can be played both with keyboard & gamepad, however we recommend keyboard as it is what the game was first tested on.

WASD / arrow keys to move
Mouse to aim

More controls open up as you play the game, read carefully every event!

CRASH BUG:

There is a crash whenever "CRAB AMBUSH" shows up, we fixed this right after submission, here is a fixed version

THEME: Out of Control
Submitted for the GTMK Jam 2020, we wanted to make a game with no scope, in which we kept adding random mechanics, events, enemies and so on until it gets out of control (plus most actions you do not get much control of too)
